CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed attestation - enhanced for Windows 11
CurrentVersion.description: This will enhance the Windows compliance policy - device health by adding five additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, firmware protection, virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed attestation - enhanced for Windows 11
OldVersion.description: This will enhance the Windows compliance policy - device health by adding five additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, firmware protection, virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Search past sessions in Copilot Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Search through your past Copilot conversations in Copilot Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: First phase of PST support in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The first phase PST (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) support in the new Outlook for Windows provides read-only access to Mail items within *.pst files. Users will be able to open *.pst files, read their emails within *.pst files, and search *.pst files for emails. All Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks data saved in the *.pst files are still there, but they cannot be accessed in this preview. Next releases will expand PST support capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport

OldVersion.title: Outlook: First phase of PST support in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The first phase PST (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) support in the new Outlook for Windows provides read-only access to Mail items within *.pst files. Users will be able to open *.pst files, read their emails within *.pst files, and search *.pst files for emails. All Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks data saved in the *.pst files are still there, but they cannot be accessed in this preview. Next releases will expand PST support capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
OldVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
OldVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Chat while screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Enable presenters to more easily access the meeting chat while screensharing by adding an entry point in the presenter toolbar.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Chat while screensharing
OldVersion.description: Enable presenters to more easily access the meeting chat while screensharing by adding an entry point in the presenter toolbar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allow Presenters to moderate Q&A
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers of town halls and webinars can now select and assign presenters to also be Q&A moderators, allowing them to manage and publish questions asked during the event. This feature lets organizers make changes to the group of moderators at any time, before or during the event, and it is available to all users organizing a town hall or webinar, regardless of license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allow Presenters to moderate Q&A
OldVersion.description: Organizers of town halls and webinars can now select and assign presenters to also be Q&A moderators, allowing them to manage and publish questions asked during the event. This feature lets organizers make changes to the group of moderators at any time, before or during the event, and it is available to all users organizing a town hall or webinar, regardless of license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open file links preference to extend across M365 apps
CurrentVersion.description: When it comes to how links to cloud-hosted Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files should open, you may prefer they open in a browser, desktop apps, or directly in Teams. Now, your Teams file open preference will extend to across Microsoft 365 apps starting with classic Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint. This makes the open file experience consistent on your Windows PC/device. If you prefer, you will still be able to choose your Teams file open preference separately.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open file links preference to extend across M365 apps
OldVersion.description: When it comes to how links to cloud-hosted Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files should open, you may prefer they open in a browser, desktop apps, or directly in Teams. Now, your Teams file open preference will extend to across Microsoft 365 apps starting with classic Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint. This makes the open file experience consistent on your Windows PC/device. If you prefer, you will still be able to choose your Teams file open preference separately.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Analytics available in Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot Analytics is designed to empower every IT and business leader to measure adoption and business impact of Copilot and agents with out-of-the-box experiences in Copilot Dashboard and customizable reporting for deeper analysis against your KPIs. With Viva Insights included, IT admins and analysts can now tailor advanced prebuilt Copilot reports with their business data or create custom reports with organizational attributes, longer usage data sets, and more granular controls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Analytics available in Microsoft 365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Copilot Analytics is designed to empower every IT and business leader to measure adoption and business impact of Copilot and agents with out-of-the-box experiences in Copilot Dashboard and customizable reporting for deeper analysis against your KPIs. With Viva Insights included, IT admins and analysts can now tailor advanced prebuilt Copilot reports with their business data or create custom reports with organizational attributes, longer usage data sets, and more granular controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap can be shared via link
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting participants can now share a link to the meeting recap from the meeting thumbnail in chat and the recap tab, making it easier to reference and share the meeting recap insights with others. Meeting participants can share the meeting recap link with anyone in their organization, for those users who don't have access to the recording or transcript, they need to request recording and transcript access before they can access the meeting recap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap can be shared via link
OldVersion.description: Meeting participants can now share a link to the meeting recap from the meeting thumbnail in chat and the recap tab, making it easier to reference and share the meeting recap insights with others. Meeting participants can share the meeting recap link with anyone in their organization, for those users who don't have access to the recording or transcript, they need to request recording and transcript access before they can access the meeting recap.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scan cold files in SharePoint and OneDrive for sensitive information
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for Business for sensitive data and classify and/or label them accordingly. This includes files that have never been scanned or scanned in some time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scan cold files in SharePoint and OneDrive for sensitive information
OldVersion.description: This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for Business for sensitive data and classify and/or label them accordingly. This includes files that have never been scanned or scanned in some time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quick sharing of files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Share a file from a chat conversation, Shared tab or a channel post to 1:1 chats, group chats, or channels with fewer clicks. When files are shared, their permissions are maintained, ensuring that recipients have the appropriate access rights. You can add additional information to your message and @mention recipients for greater clarity and alignment.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quick sharing of files in Teams
OldVersion.description: Share a file from a chat conversation, Shared tab or a channel post to 1:1 chats, group chats, or channels with fewer clicks. When files are shared, their permissions are maintained, ensuring that recipients have the appropriate access rights. You can add additional information to your message and @mention recipients for greater clarity and alignment.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive file-level archiving
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces archiving at the file level for Microsoft 365 Archive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create a PowerPoint slide from a file or prompt
CurrentVersion.description: Creating impactful slides can be challenging and time-consuming. Copilot helps you quickly turn your ideas and files into a fully designed slide with content ready to edit and refine, making the presentation creation and refinement process more personalized and efficient.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Enhance the Comment Experience for Live Surveys
CurrentVersion.description: Updating the survey experience to provide ability to display the comment box on the screen when a user is providing a rating. Currently, the survey automatically progresses to the next question after the user selects a rating, without giving them an opportunity to leave a comment. With this change, the program will have the ability for the comment box will be persistently visible, encouraging users to provide more qualitative feedback alongside their rating.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention –  Configure network share groups using IP or IP address range
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, data officers can now configure specific IP addresses or IP address ranges in DLP Settings within Sensitive service domain groups to be used in DLP policies for more precise scoping.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Insert cloud files from One Drive in Copilot Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Insert cloud files from One Drive in Copilot Chat web grounding conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Available from Mexico Central, Spain Central
CurrentVersion.description: Windows 365 will be available in Mexico Central and Spain Central.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Local desktop access for Windows 365 Boot user
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables end users to return to their physical PC using the CTRL-ALT-DEL screen or from Cloud PC error screens when their device is in Boot mode. Administrators can configure and customize this feature within the Guided Scenario for Boot.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Time Suggestions assistance while creating new meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Get assistance with time suggestions when creating new meetings in modern Outlook. This feature is currently supported for non-recurring meetings only. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Card animation
CurrentVersion.description: Card animation will enable motion for web parts on Pages and News.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot highlights important meetings to prep for
CurrentVersion.description: In this update, Copilot in the calendar will highlight important meetings to prep for today and in the upcoming week with a reason for the recommendation. Users can use Prepare with Copilot to get started.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate with Apple Pencil Experience on OneDrive for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Coming soon to Microsoft OneDrive: OneDrive iOS users will be able to use Apple original pencil toolkit to create, edit, and manage PDF annotations. This integration will provide users with advanced, low-latency tools that align with Apple Pencil experience, making it easier and more enjoyable for iOS users to annotate PDFs within OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Sticky notes accelerator
CurrentVersion.description: Sticky note accelerators will help users work faster in Whiteboard by simplifying adding sticky notes. With a single click, users can quickly add sticky notes, making brainstorming and collaboration seamless.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot available in Copilot Chat in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We will be adding declarative agents support for agents in Copilot Chat in Outlook. This roadmap item tracks availability in classic Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot Pages – View, edit & share in Outlook Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Continue working with Copilot and colleagues while on the go, with the ability to view, edit and share Pages on mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Chat one-on-one with SharePoint agents in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can chat one-on-one with a SharePoint agent directly within Teams chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Long-term retention period for M365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the ability to set longer term retention periods to restore beyond one year.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed attestation - enhanced for Windows 11
CurrentVersion.description: This will enhance the Windows compliance policy - device health by adding five additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, firmware protection, virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

CurrentVersion.description: Search through your past Copilot conversations in Copilot Chat.
